bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jerry Spagnoli studied photography at the San Francisco Art Institute where he received a BFA and completed his MFA at Mills College in Oakland, California. His work is in a number of permanent collections throughout the United States, including the Museum of Modern Art, New York and the J. Paul Getty Museum, Santa Monica, California.
